about_the_game:
An escapist game about very important topics: finding yourself, gaining confidence and knowing your inner world.

Get ready for a magical journey! In the game, you'll become an adorable little owl, dreaming of flying but lacking this gift. Meditate near owl altars, unlock incredible abilities within yourself, use ancient mechanisms, and make friends!

Embark on thrilling trials, uncover the mysteries of the island, and help its inhabitants find happiness and joy. Explore enigmatic astral places, complete quests, and enjoy breathtaking views.

Friendship, adventure, magic – all of this awaits you on our island! Make the hearts of the inhabitants flutter with happiness – in your feathers! Prepare for takeoff and join us on a journey to the astral world right now!

Look into the world of spirits

Explore the night world to understand yourself. Read the minds of others, jump high and believe in yourself!
From the moment you spread your wings as the adorable little owl protagonist, the island becomes your playground, enticing you to soar through lush forests, soar above serene lakes, and glide over rolling hills.



Explore the island
An open world in front of you, small and compact, but still open!
The island's open world invites you to set your own pace. Whether you wish to dive headfirst into quests or lose yourself in the thrill of exploration, the choice is yours.



Make new friends
Communicate with the islanders and help them to solve their problems.
In a world where magic, exploration, and growth intertwine, the friendships you make are the heart and soul of the experience. As you explore the island, remember that each new connection enriches the tapestry of your adventure.



Search for treasures
There are many secrets and easter eggs hidden on the island, can you collect them all?
Every path you tread, every riddle you solve, brings you closer to unveiling the treasure's location. The island becomes your canvas of discovery, each landmark a clue waiting to be deciphered.



Enjoy the music festival
Hippies, punks, anarchists, rockers and metalheads, we have a riff for everyone!
The festival isn't just about the music; it's about the emotions, memories, and sense of togetherness it evokes. As you wander through the festival grounds, you're surrounded by the exuberant melodies, the infectious beats, and the sheer joy that radiates from the characters you've met along the way.


Learn something new about yourself
Meditate at the altars, discover new sides of yourself.
The journey towards self-discovery is not a linear path; it's a series of encounters, challenges, and revelations that gradually shape your character's evolution. Through interactions with the island's inhabitants, you'll glean insights into your own strengths and vulnerabilities.



Made by a small team
We are not a huge team, we were afraid for a long time to make a "dream game". But here it is in front of you, what do you say?
Each member of the team infused a piece of themselves into the game. The art reflects the artist's emotions, the writing echoes the writer's experiences, and the music resonates with the composer's soul. This synergy adds layers of authenticity, elevating the game beyond mere entertainment to an experience that leaves an indelible mark on players.

short_description: Summer! Sea! Festival! You've been waiting for this for so long, and here you are! But what is it, why are the stages empty, and everybody around you is sad? Explore the island, learn the stories of the islanders, unlock new strengths during meditations and arrange the loudest and coolest festival!
